definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Analysts also predict improvements at Morgan Stanley /quotes/comstock/13*!
sentences.chinese: 分析家还预测，摩根士丹利将有业绩改善。

sentences.english: For the first time, it's poised to surpass both Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley in the lucrative M&A business.
sentences.chinese: 在兼并重组业务方面上它超过了高盛和摩根士丹利。

sentences.english: Morgan Stanley is a caterpillar in metamorphosis.
sentences.chinese: 摩根士丹利是一只正在变形的毛毛虫。

sentences.english: CICC and Morgan Stanley declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 中金和摩根士丹利拒绝发表评论。

sentences.english: The two left are Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 尚存的二家是摩根士丹利和高盛集团。

sentences.english: Among them isRichard Berner of Morgan Stanley.
sentences.chinese: 摩根士丹利经济学家贝尔纳就是其中的一位。

sentences.english: Stock-trading revenue was less than half what Goldman brought in during the quarter.
sentences.chinese: 当季摩根士丹利股票交易收入也不到高盛的一半。

definition: the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business
Moody's, company specializing in financial market ratings
